item.title: De-identifying (Anonymizing) Data for Development
item.description: When working with Personally Identifying Information (PII) or Protected Health Information (PHI), it’s often necessary to “de-identify” that information, particularly if you are displaying it in any way (for reporting or displaying research results). You want to ensure that the data you’re showing can’t be used to identify a single individual.
